selected_quotes: Ever wonder how fish prod. varies w/ latitude? We did too, so
Positive start to week: NEW paper w/
Some key results...Fish communities show different latitude-production patterns compared to fish species
Al Lindner talking on tv this am about how surprised folks are at no. of bass in northern lakes. Data supports this!
Latitudinal trends in fish production..Orange is production, green is production per growing degree-day.

citation.title: Pattern and scale in latitude–production relationships for freshwater fishes
